reviews.text: Please prioritize immediate rollout of consent tracking and one-click opt-out automation to meet CCPA compliance requirements.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes CCPA compliance by requiring specific actions.

reviews.text: The deadline for full deployment is 48 hours from now.
reviews.reason_text: Only provides a deadline without action.

reviews.text: As part of this rollout, ensure an audit-ready log is maintained for all consent changes, capturing user ID, timestamp, and source IP for each event.
reviews.reason_text: Requires maintaining logs with specific data.

reviews.text: Additionally, set up a nightly export of these logs to the designated S3 bucket ccpa-audit-logs, encrypted using AES-256.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes the action of exporting logs encrypted using AES-256.

reviews.text: Please confirm the assigned development owner responsible for this rollout and provide a rollback plan in case any deployment issues arise.
reviews.reason_text: Discusses roles but doesn't enforce behavior.
